overview.en: MYRT is a decentralized stable digital currency issued by Libra Xs Foundation, and its value is pegged with MYR at a ratio of 1:1. Issuance based on blockchain technology and smart contract technology ensures transparency and allows audits to be efficient and convenient
overview.zh: MYRT是由Libra Xs Foundation发行的去中心化稳定数字货币，其价值与马来西亚林吉特1：1锚定。基于区块链技术和智能合约技术发行，保证了透明度，让审计能够高效便捷
